Privacy Policy ‚Äì Safe Driving
Last updated: July 3, 2025

At Safe Driving, protecting your personal data is a priority. This privacy policy aims to clearly inform you about how your data is collected, used, stored, and protected when you use our application.

1. Data collected
During registration:
- Full name
- Email address
- Phone number
- Role (driver or passenger)
- Password (encrypted)

For drivers:
- ID card and driver's license
- Vehicle information and documents
- Verification selfie
- Geolocation (if enabled)
- Preferences and notifications

While using the app:
- Trip history
- Real-time GPS location (if enabled)
- Interactions with the application (clicks, actions, preferences)
- Reviews, comments, and ratings

2. Use of data
- Create and manage your user account
- Verify your identity and drivers‚Äô identities
- Ensure proper functioning of the application
- Offer relevant trips (based on location)
- Improve user experience (recommendations, support)
- Send you important notifications (trips, safety, etc.)

3. Data sharing
We never sell your data to third parties.
Some information may only be shared:
- With passengers to identify their driver (name, photo, vehicle model, license plate)
- With partner services for payment processing or identity verification
- With competent authorities, only in case of a legal obligation

4. Storage and security
- Your data is hosted on secure servers located in France or within the EU
- Passwords are encrypted
- Sensitive documents are protected and accessible only by secure internal systems

5. Geolocation
GPS activation is optional but necessary for using real-time transportation features.
You can disable geolocation at any time from your phone settings.

6. Cookies and trackers
We only use technical cookies essential for the platform to function properly. No browsing data is collected for advertising purposes.

7. Data retention period
- Your data is retained as long as your account is active
- You can request deletion of your data at any time
- Legal documents (drivers) are kept for 5 years in compliance with applicable law

8. Your rights
In accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), you have the right to:
- Access your personal data
- Correct or update your data
- Delete your account and your data
- Withdraw your consent
- File a complaint with the CNIL

To exercise your rights, contact us at: privacy@safedriving.app

9. Changes
We may update this policy at any time. You will be notified in case of major changes. The most recent version will always be available in the application.

Thank you for your trust
Your safety and privacy are essential. We are committed to protecting your data with transparency, responsibility, and respect.
